attributes.action: use his leadership and influence in the House of Common to replace Speaker Martin forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speaker Martin is perceived to be at the forefront of defending the bad practices regarding MP’s expenses. His actions continue to bring the House of Commons into such disrepute that has probably not been seen since the Reform Act of 1832 when Rotten Boroughs were abolished. By signing this petition you will help send a message to Gordon Brown that the public want to see this mess cleared up and a start made at reform by replacing 
Speaker Martin

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
